channel.title: privacy on Carson Connard
channel.description: Recent content in privacy on Carson Connard

item.title: Techno
item.description: I listen to a lot of techno music, and I am very interested in its history and developement in different scenes around the world. Amongst all genres that I listen to, I am the most interested in techno, including its history and evolution as it spread from its origin in Detroit, over to Germany, Belgium, the UK, and the Netherlands, and how these influences abroad meshed with the sound back in the US (and other regions in Eurasia and the world).

item.title: Talks & Travel
item.description: I have presented my work at various conferences, seminars, and workshops. This is a list of my talks and math-related travels.
